resources.string: Access to the location service is required to show your current location on the map.

This application requires location permission. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Lukoil\'.
Location permission is required for this application.
Internet bağlantısı yok. Daha sonra tekrar deneyiniz.
Bir hata oluştu. Daha sonra tekrar deneyiniz.
